author: Video Advice
description:
Dr. Robert Epstein, a Harvard-trained psychologist, has dedicated his career to studying how technology influences human behavior. His research has raised important questions about the power of algorithms, online platforms, and the ways digital tools can shape public opinion.

If you want to learn more from Dr. Robert Epstein, we highly recommend exploring his teachings - https://aeon.co/users/robert-epstein
https://drrobertepstein.com/biography/

Excerpts courtesy of Danny Jones and The Joe Rogan Experience.
Watch the full interviews here:
Danny Jones – https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jw8PQgLrLgI
Joe Rogan – https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Azu8XnZdxeA

title: The Shocking Discovery of a Harvard Scientist Who Was Warned to Stay Silent
